content.rendered:
Tropix

Although secluded, Tropix is within 10 minutes walking distance of Sosua central. All rooms come equipped with a refrigerator, free WiFi, and ceiling fans (most have the option of air conditioning). The hotel offers breakfast served poolside and a small communal kitchen is also available to guests who may wish to prepare their own meals.

Casa Valeria

Situated in the town centre in a quiet street connecting two main roads Casa Valeria is at the centre of Sosua’s night-life. Many restaurants and bars are nearby and it is only a 5 minute walk to the beach. The rooms are equipped with all the amenities you would like: cable TV, electronic safe, refrigerator with minibar, free WiFi, AC and fan.

Ocean Palms

Between Sosua and Cabarete, and only seven miles from Puerto Plata airport, you’ll come across a hilltop overlooking expanses of palm trees and unspoilt beach; there you’ll find the Coconut Palms Resort. Playa Encuentro is a ten-minute walk from the resort – once there you’ll have surfing, kiteboarding, horse-back riding and buggy trips to choose from.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Paradise Island
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you’re looking for something special, look no further. This all day trip includes 3 meals, private transportation to Paradise Island (known locally as Cayo Arena), and guided snorkeling around one of the Dominican Republic’s most beautiful reefs. The day starts early at 7.30, where we meet and begin our journey to…
